resources.string: Find a large, clean area that is free of fire hazards and well ventilated.

You will need: "
"A sprayer "
"Paint "
"Sanding and Polishing Tools "
"Respirator and Goggles
Remove any rust, dents, trim or body modifications.
Sand down to bare metal, then clean with denatured alcohol or mineral spirits.
Apply masking tape to surfaces you do NOT want painted. "\n"Apply primer. After primer cures, sand until primed surface is smooth.
Prepare the paint, then paint the car. "\n"When the paint is completely dry, use a rubbing compound or wax to buff the new finish.
